content: k2 29/33 sts into it and pull the tails down into the tassel fringe trim round 6 ndl 1 k2 kfb sm knit to marker sm kfb x2 k1 tassel to 1 5 from top of head to bottom of tassel ndl 2 k1 kfb x 2 sm knit to marker sm kfb k3 35/39 to attach securely thread one tail from the top of the tassel sts head into a yarn ndl and insert into the center front of the note if you do not like working with markers there will first stockinette row thread the other tail and insert it one always be 8 10 sts on the sides between increases st over tie ends into knot in back thread one tail into yarn ndl and bring it out at the level of the tassel wrap wrap lower sides across tassel head and insert back into boot on opposite side work 7 9 rnds of garter stitch starting and ending with a you came out of do the same with the other tail pull on purl round remove markers as you go place a locking marker tails to press tassel head firmly against boot tie ends in knot on first garter ridge and count up from there you will create 4 5 garter ridges instructions for dpn s cast on using judy s magic cast on on 2 ndls as you begin to instep work the first round split the stitches on to 4 needles and work with a fifth needle you will now be working back and forth in row to create instep k20 22 ssk turn row 1 with yarn in front slip decreased st p-wise move knitting abbreviations yarn to back k6 p2tog turn row 2 with yarn in back slip decreased st p-wise pull on k knit yarn to tighten st k6 ssk turn work row 1 & 2 a total of 6x 7x do not turn on the last k2tog knit 2 together repeat of row 2 knit to end of ndl 2 22/24 sts kfb knit front & back you will return now to knitting in the round next round p6 7 k2tog pull down on yarn to tighten st ndl needle p6 ssk p6 7 20/22 sts place locking stitch marker on garter ridge to mark round p purl pm place marker upper sides round 1 knit all sts p-wise purlwise round 2 p6 7 k1 p6 k1 p6 7 repeat repeat work rnds 1 & 2 a total of 5x there will be 6 garter ridges including the one with the marker round s round s sm slip marker cuff change to larger ndls and work 6 rnds of stockinette ssk slip slip knit together bind off using a stretchy bind off i used this one set up knit 2 stitches slip 2 stitches back on the left needle st s stitch s and knit decrease through the back loops *k1 insert left ndl x times though fronts of both
